scanCode(String) - Method in class com.example.homeheirs.Scanner
Initiates the barcode scanning process with the provided barcode raw value.
Scanner - Class in com.example.homeheirs
The Scanner class is responsible for handling barcode scanning functionality using the ZXing library and making API requests to retrieve product information.
